author: Lesley Waters
method: In a bowl, mix the whipped cream, yoghurt, lime juice and maple syrup together. To serve, spoon the mixture into a dessert glass. Top with the chopped mango, drizzle with extra maple syrup and garnish with lime wedges.
ingredients: 125ml/4fl oz double cream, softly whipped,  3 tbsp Greek-style yoghurt,  ½ lime, juice only,  1 tbsp maple syrup, plus extra to serve,  ½ mango, peeled and chopped,  lime wedges, to garnish
